flags.description: Prevents health from spawning on the map (DM Only).
Prevents powerups from spawning on the map (DM Only).
Weapons remain after being picked up by a player.
Enables the falling damage used from ZDoom.
Enables the stronger but less aggressive falling damage used from Hexen.
Stay on the same map when someone exits (DM Only).
Spawn players as far as possible from other players (DM Only).
Forces the players that were killed to respawn (DM Only).
Prevents armor from spawning on the map (DM Only).
Kill anyone that tries to exit from the map (DM Only).
Players have infinite ammo.
Monsters do not spawn on the map.
Monsters will respawn sometime after their death.
Almost all items respawn after being picked up by a player.
Monsters are fast.
Prevents players from jumping.
Prevents the players from being able to freelook.
Allows powerful powerups to respawn.
Prevents players from modifying their Field of View.
Prevents multiplayer-only weapons from spawning in a map (Coop only).
Prevents players from crouching.
Players lose all of their inventory when killed (Coop only).
Players will lose all of their keys when killed (Coop only).
Players will lose all of their weapons when killed (Coop only).
Players will lose all of their armor when killed (Coop only).
Players will lose all of their powerups when killed (Coop only).
Players will lose all their ammo when killed (Coop only).
Players lose half of their ammo when killed (Coop only).
Override MAPINFO flags to allow jumping.
Override MAPINFO flags to allow crouching.
Players drop their current weapon when killed or fragged.
Prevents Skulltag runes from spawning on the map.
Flags are instantly returned when the carriers were fragged.
Players cannot change teams after joining one.
Players are placed in teams automatically by the server.
Double amount of ammo that items give you like skill 1 and 5 do.
Players slowly lose health when above 100%, like in Quake.
Allows the BFG to be fired vertically.
Barrels respawn after being blown up (DM Only).
Players do not have temporary invulnerability when respawning (DM Only).
Players will have a shotgun when they spawn (Coop Only).
Players respawn at the same location they were killed at (Coop only).
Keep players on same teams between maps.
Players frags are never reset when advancing to the next map.
Players can not respawn once killed or fragged.
When fragged, the player will lose a frag.
Never run out of any inventory item.
Enforce same OpenGL settings on all clients.
Prevent players from rocketjumping.
Players will be awarded points from the damage that they do to monsters.
Enforce clients showing translucency effects.
All monsters must be killed before advancing into the next map.
Prevent players from using the automap.
Prevent players from seeing allies on the automap.
Prevent players from spying on other players.
Allow players to use the chasecam.
Prevent players from committing suicide via the console.
Prevent players from using autoaim.
Use single-player item layout in coop.
Players can't identify targets by looking at them.
Apply rules about LMS spectators to other game modes.
Disable coop information on the sides of the screen.
Disable unlagged.
Allow players to run and shoot through each other.
Disable medals.
Find shortest textures like Doom.
Use buggier stair building.
Limit pain elementals to 20 lost souls.
Don't let other players hear item pickups like in Vanilla Doom.
Actors are infinitely tall.  Note that this will break ZDoom THING bridges.
Allow silent BFG trick.
Enable wallrunning.
Spawn item drops on the floor.
All special lines can block use lines.
Disable Boom door light effect.
Raven's scrollers use their original carrying speed.
Use sector based sound target code.
Limit DeHackEd MaxHealth to health bonus.
Trace ignores lines with the same sector on both sides.
Monsters cannot move when hanging over a dropoff.
Scrolling sectors are additive like in Boom.
Monsters will be able to see the player even if the player has a partial invisibility sphere.
Use ZDoom's limited air movement instead of Skulltag's.
Allow plasma bumping.
Allow players to instantly respawn by holding +use.
Prevent players from taunting.
Use the original Doom sound curve, which causes sounds to fade away at a shorter distance.
Use intermission screens/music instead of Skulltag's win/lose intermissions.
Disable stealth monsters.
Explosions have infinite height, like in doom2.exe.
Prevent players from using a crosshair.
Players are forced to switch weapons on pickup.
Instantly moving floors are not silent.
Sector sounds use original method for sound origin.
Use original Doom heights for clipping against projectiles.
Monsters can't be pushed over dropoffs.
Uses Skulltag's old behavior when (NET) ACS Scripts are used.
Allow GetPlayerInput() to get the full range of button presses.
Players can't land, which prevents a movement exploit.
Use the doom2.exe random number generator, which makes the SSG more powerful.
Add NOGRAVITY flag to map-spawned spheres.
Prevent ACS scripts from terminating on disconnect.
Use original horizontal thrusting code.
Non-solid objects drop through ZDoom bridge THINGS.
Use ZDoom 1.23b33's jumping physics.
Prevent switching weapons in the middle of raising them.
